text: Avalariyathe is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Asha Khan, starring Prathapachandran and Sathaar in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Suganthy * Anand Babu... Anand * Prathapachandran... Dr. Prabhakara Varma *Sathaar... David d'Cruz *Renuka... Dr. Sumam *Kollam Ajith... SI Babu * Bobby Kottarakkara... Kuttan *Hari... T. S. Warrior (bird watcher) ==References== Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Avalariyathe
